statements: UPDATE FinancialRiskAnalysis SET market_data = 'Stocks', statistical_analysis = '{"mean": 12.5, "std_dev": 3.2}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE FinancialRiskAnalysis SET historical_data = '2020-01-01,2020-01-02,2020-01-03', market_data = 'Bonds' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE FinancialRiskAnalysis SET market_data = 'New Market Data', historical_data = 'Updated Historical Data' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE FinancialRiskAnalysis SET statistical_analysis = '{"mean": 0.25, "std_dev": 0.1}' , market_data = 'Market Data Update' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE market_data SET open_price=100.50, close_price=105.75 WHERE symbol='AAPL' AND date='2022-05-01';
UPDATE statistical_analysis SET skewness=0.25, mean_price=110.20, standard_deviation=3.5 WHERE symbol='GOOGL' AND date='2022-06-15';
UPDATE market_data SET open_price = 100.50, close_price = 105.75 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-10'
UPDATE statistical_analysis SET mean_price = 103.25, standard_deviation = 5.75, skewness = -0.12 WHERE date = '2022-01-10' AND symbol = 'AAPL'
UPDATE market_data SET closing_price = 150.55, volume = 10000 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE statistical_analysis SET avg_price = 160.75, stddev_price = 12.34 WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE market_data SET closing_price = 100.50, volume = 50000 WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE statistical_analysis SET avg_price = 105.75, stddev_price = 10.25 WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE historical_market_data SET open_price = 100.50, close_price = 105.75 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE financial_risk_management SET recommendation = 'Buy low, sell high' WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE historical_market_data SET open_price = 150.25, close_price = 155.75 WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE financial_risk_management SET recommendation = 'SELL' WHERE stock_symbol = 'GOOGL';
UPDATE historical_market_data SET open_price = 100.25, close_price = 105.75 WHERE date = '2022-01-15' AND symbol = 'AAPL'
UPDATE risk_assessment SET alpha = 0.85, r_squared = 0.95, volatility = 0.12 WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL'
UPDATE historical_market_data SET open_price = 100.25, close_price = 105.75 WHERE date = '2022-01-15' AND symbol = 'AAPL';
UPDATE risk_assessment SET beta = 1.3, alpha = 0.05, volatility = 0.2 WHERE symbol = 'GOOGL' AND id = 10;
